languages.text: {n}Обратив свой ясный взор на Соломона, Арджента восклицает:{/n} "Проктор! Слышала о твоем побеге — о пленнике, что вырвался из лап ксеносских тюремщиков. Вижу, ты даже отыскал Вольного Торговца — Император наделил тебя невероятной стойкостью и рвением!"

{n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"
languages.original_text: {n}Обратив свой ясный взор на Соломона, Арджента восклицает:{/n} "Проктор! Слышала о твоем побеге — о пленнике, что вырвался из лап ксеносских тюремщиков. Вижу, ты даже отыскал Вольного Торговца — Император наделил тебя невероятной стойкостью и рвением!"

{n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

{n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

{n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔清澈的目光转向了索罗蒙，高声呼喊着。{/n}“监察官！我已经听说你越狱的事情了，你从异形的魔爪中挣脱了出来。我注意到，你甚至还找到了行商浪人！帝皇确实赐予了你超乎常人的坚韧与决心！”
languages.original_text: {n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔清澈的目光转向了索罗蒙，高声呼喊着。{/n}“监察官！我已经听说你越狱的事情了，你从异形的魔爪中挣脱了出来。我注意到，你甚至还找到了行商浪人！帝皇确实赐予了你超乎常人的坚韧与决心！”

languages.text: {n}Argenta vuelve su mirada despejada hacia Solomorne y exclama:{/n} «¡Procurador! He oído hablar de su fuga; de un prisionero que se zafó de las garras de sus carceleros xenos. Veo que incluso se ha reunido con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. ¡El Emperador le ha bendecido con una fortaleza y una resolución impresionantes!».
languages.original_text: {n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta vuelve su mirada despejada hacia Solomorne y exclama:{/n} «¡Procurador! He oído hablar de su fuga; de un prisionero que se zafó de las garras de sus carceleros xenos. Veo que incluso se ha reunido con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. ¡El Emperador le ha bendecido con una fortaleza y una resolución impresionantes!».

languages.text: {n}Argenta tourne ses yeux clairs vers Solomorne et s'exclame :{/n} « Proctor ! J'ai entendu parler de votre évasion ! Un prisonnier qui est parvenu à se soustraire à ses geôliers xénos. Je vois que vous avez même retrouvé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ! L'Empereur vous a octroyé tant de force et de détermination ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta tourne ses yeux clairs vers Solomorne et s'exclame :{/n} « Proctor ! J'ai entendu parler de votre évasion ! Un prisonnier qui est parvenu à se soustraire à ses geôliers xénos. Je vois que vous avez même retrouvé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ! L'Empereur vous a octroyé tant de force et de détermination ! »

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは澄んだ視線をソロモーンに向けて叫んだ。{/n}「代理人！あなたの脱走について聞いた。異種族の看守の手から囚人が逃げ出したと。さらにローグトレーダーを見つけたとは。皇帝陛下はあなたに驚くべき不屈の精神と決意を授けてくださったのだな！」
languages.original_text: {n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは澄んだ視線をソロモーンに向けて叫んだ。{/n}「代理人！あなたの脱走について聞いた。異種族の看守の手から囚人が逃げ出したと。さらにローグトレーダーを見つけたとは。皇帝陛下はあなたに驚くべき不屈の精神と決意を授けてくださったのだな！」

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarını Solomorne'a götüren Argenta konuşuyor.{/n} "Üsteğmen! Kaçışınızı duydum. Zeno zindancıların elinden kurtulan bir mahkûm... Bakıyorum da Hür Tacir'i bile bulmuşsun. İmparator sana inanılmaz bir metanet ve kararlılık vermiş!"
languages.original_text: {n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışlarını Solomorne'a götüren Argenta konuşuyor.{/n} "Üsteğmen! Kaçışınızı duydum. Zeno zindancıların elinden kurtulan bir mahkûm... Bakıyorum da Hür Tacir'i bile bulmuşsun. İmparator sana inanılmaz bir metanet ve kararlılık vermiş!"

languages.text: {n}Argenta wendet ihren klaren Blick Solomorne zu und ruft:{/n} "Proktor! Ich habe von Eurer Flucht gehört – von einem Gefangenen, der die Fesseln seiner Xenos-Häscher durchtrennt hat. Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr sogar {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gefunden – der Imperator hat Euch mit unglaublicher Tapferkeit und Entschlossenheit gesegnet!"
languages.original_text: {n}Turning her clear gaze to Solomorne, Argenta exclaims,{/n} "Proctor! I have heard about your escape — about a prisoner who broke free from the clutches of his xenos jailers. I see you have even found the Rogue Trader — the Emperor has blessed you with incredible fortitude and resolve!"

Ich habe von Eurer Flucht gehört – von einem Gefangenen, der die Fesseln seiner Xenos-Häscher durchtrennt hat. Wie ich sehe, habt Ihr sogar {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gefunden – der Imperator hat Euch mit unglaublicher Tapferkeit und Entschlossenheit gesegnet!"
